      • setListener

        Callback
        参数:

      • startApp

        public void startApp​(java.lang.String pkg)
        start app with package
        参数:
        pkg - package name

      • startApp

        public void startApp​(java.lang.String pkg,
                     java.lang.String clazz)
        start app with package/class
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name

      • startApp

        public void startApp​(java.lang.String pkg,
                     java.lang.String clazz,
                     java.lang.String type,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     java.lang.String uri,
                     java.lang.String info)
        start app with package/class
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name
        type - video/* image/*
        title - name of video/image
        uri - video uri(local[/storage/emulated/0/Movies/test.mp4] or net[http://192.168.1.1/test.mp4] address)
        info - json data with JAppInfo

      • startApp

        public void startApp​(java.lang.String pkg,
                     java.lang.String clazz,
                     java.lang.String key,
                     boolean value)
        start app with package/class
        参数:
        pkg - package name
        clazz - activity class name
        key - param-key
        value - param-value

        参数:
        pkg - package name
        keys - param-key
        values - param-value

      • openBrowser

        public void openBrowser​(java.lang.String url)
        start browser
        参数:
        url - HTTP/HTTPS must be included

      • openBrowser

        public void openBrowser​(java.lang.String packageName,
                        java.lang.String url)
        start browser. If packageName is exist, it will show select dialog.
        参数:
        packageName - for example : com.android.chrome、org.mozilla.vrbrowser
        url - HTTP/HTTPS must be included

      • getIcon

        参数:

        clazz - activity class name
        返回:
        app icon data with bin
